name: Remedy Template Library
short_description: RTL makes developing integrations using Remedy's C API much easier and less error prone. Integrations using RTL have as much an 80% reduction in code, are much simpler, and in most cases have better performance. http://rtl.sourceforge.net/doc/index.html
